    Magabot @ CUF 2013

    16 May 2014

    About a year ago, in June 2013, we participated in Conferências saúdecuf with a poster which at the time we forgot to post about on our blog. The poster was regarding our tests involving robotic remote presence, which took place in Hospital Dona Estefânia. Envisioning to develop a platform that would offer hospitalised children a way to travel and engage with the world while staying at the hospital. The work was developed in partnership with Paulo Alvito of IDMind, Francisco Dias, André Moreira and Hospital Dona Estefânia. It uses magabot, our lowcost laptop on wheels robot.

    Here is the poster in Portuguese:

    Read the full post
